clues.text: A dentil is a small block resembling one of these, hence its name

The name of this biblical tower means "Gate of God"

His estate, Wolf House, was completed in 1913 but burned down the day before he was to move in

rounds.text: In an 1855 poem he wrote, "I guess it must be the flag of my disposition, out of hopeful green stuff woven"
